segments.text: The kitchen feels like a stage, with props and actors unaware of the drama about to unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman, so caught up in her routine, and I wonder if she ever looks up from her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children, they embody playful mischief, yet they're teetering on the edge of trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of that overflowing sink makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascading down the cabinets, pooling like a silent warning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the tidy garden outside and the chaos within is stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In this moment, I wish I could intervene, to remind them that the world is filled with consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR
